meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>determine</kanji>d <kanji>amount</kanji> is an amount that is fixed, aka a <vocabulary>fixed amount</vocabulary>, a <vocabulary>fixed sum</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>flat rate</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
